00025 #ifndef SYX_ERROR_H
00026 #define SYX_ERROR_H
00027 
00028 #include <stdio.h>
00029 #include "syx-types.h"
00030 #include "syx-config.h"
00031 #include "syx-utils.h"
00032 
00033 #include <stdarg.h>
00034 
00035 #ifdef WINCE
00036 #include <windows.h>
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 SYX_BEGIN_DECLS
00040 
00041 typedef syx_uint32 SyxErrorType;
00042 
00043 typedef struct SyxErrorEntry SyxErrorEntry;
00044 
00046 struct SyxErrorEntry
00047 {
00048   syx_symbol name;
00049   SyxOop klass;
00050 };
00051 
00052 EXPORT extern void syx_error_init (void);
00053 EXPORT extern void syx_error_clear (void);
00054 EXPORT extern SyxErrorType syx_error_register (syx_symbol name, SyxOop klass);
00055 EXPORT extern SyxErrorEntry *syx_error_lookup (SyxErrorType type);
00056 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_signal (SyxErrorType type, SyxOop message);
00057 EXPORT extern SyxOop syx_signal_create_context (SyxErrorType type, SyxOop message);
00058 EXPORT extern void syx_warning (syx_symbol fmt, ...);
00059 EXPORT extern void syx_error (syx_symbol fmt, ...);
00060 EXPORT extern void syx_perror (syx_symbol message);
00061 
00063 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_signal_does_not_understand(SyxOop receiver, SyxOop selector);
00064 
00066 #define syx_debug printf
00067 
00068 SYX_END_DECLS    
00069 
00070 #endif /* SYX_ERROR_H */
